description_html:
Marquetry Side Table
Bronze - High Polish
Width: 25" - Depth: 7.75" - Height: 26.25"
Finish Customization Available
MADE TO ORDER IN CHICAGO
Each element of the piece is carved separately from a single block of metal, then joined together with meticulous precision.The radial pattern of the Marquetry Side Table is inspired by centuries of handcrafted tradition. A thin diamond post rises from a dynamically reflective base, supporting an elegant tray with a subtle ridge.
